Context:
* The George Brown College theatre programs' graduating students will host live, online performances of Three Sisters & Co in April 2021.
* The play is an adaptation of Anton Chekhov's original work by Director Rob Kempson and the Ensemble.
* The performances will be broadcasted via YouTube.
* Instead of admission fees, donations are being requested for the COVID-19 Student Emergency Relief Fund.
* Donors will receive a tax receipt for donations of $20 or more.
* Contact Gabriella Goutam at the George Brown College Foundation (gabriella.goutam@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000 ext. 3289) for more information on making a donation or other ways to support students.
* For inquiries about the Three Sisters & Co production, contact Cindy Bautista (Cindy.Bautista@georgebrown.ca).
